intrigue: observing the surrounding landscape and lost in your thoughts, you do not notice the man in front of you and hustle him. You apologize, but the man being very nice you get to know each other. His name is Gaspard-Jo, and he is a soup seller. Generously, he rewards the talent of the players he finds on his way.

a small caravan with a chimney is heading towards you. You greet politely the merchant, who, after a quick discussion during which you learn that his name is Gaspard-Jo, turns out to want to reward you for your good deeds.

ultimateFood: Having heard of the good deeds perpetuated by your guild, he hands you several **{reward} ultimate soup{reward>1?s:}**, which you store carefully.

item: Noticing your guild crest on your chest, and impressed by your build, he offers you an item that he says might be useful to you.
commonFood: Believing that you are not powerful enough to get his goods for free, he offers you **{reward} candy{reward>1?s:}**.
fullCommonFood: Seeing that you are not very powerful, he wants to offer you candies, but unfortunately you no longer have enough space to take them. You then decide to accept them to eat them on the spot.
